name: Yarashii Hotel
description:
Welcome to Yarashii Hotel, a place where all your dreams will become real!

You've received a letter with an invitation to spend some time in a newly opened hotel, Yarashii Hotel. Apparently, everything you wish will become real once you get in, however... Not everything might be as it looks!

Explore hundreds of procedurally generated rooms while you meet all kind of entities eager to satisfy all of your desires! But beware! Some of them will try to catch you and make you stay in the hotel forever...

Game Features

  • Procedurally Generated: Every single playthrough will be different!
  • Anime / Cartoon Aesthetics: Colorful manga / anime looks.
  • Interesting Story: Will you discover the reality of the hotel?
  • Variety of Characters: Demons, Succubus, Cat girls...
